text: Egha an amebam ko afeziam Eli bagha zuima a deragh aning damuasava Godɨn azai. A kamaghɨn Elkana mɨgei, “Ikiavɨra Itir God nɨn amuir kam damutɨ, a borir igharazitaba batam, eghtɨ me otarir nɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God ganɨngizimɨn danganim iniam.” Eli aning mɨkemeghtɨ, aning uamategh uan nguibamɨn mangam.
